name: The Last Kingdom
description:
Description 

You have been sent on a mission to navigate the environment and kill the goblin menace. Your king has demanded you to do whatever it takes to complete your mission, even if that means killing every last goblin you see. So what are you waiting for, pick up your sword and slay that menace.

Features

  • Choice Driven Outcome
  • Simple Control Scheme
  • You run, jump and slay goblins. What else is there to say.
  • Designed for Windows Computers

Bio:

Hi, I'm Zane. I'm an up-and-coming artist and game designer. I try to design games that are enjoyable to play, but also make you think about the story behind the game. For my first project in Media Design School,  I developed "The Last Kingdom", my very first game. I hope you all enjoy.
